name: 3 Games in 1: Tak and the Power of Juju / SpongeBob SquarePants: SuperSponge / Rugrats: I Gotta Go Party
summary: A collection of three Nickelodeon games on a single cartridge.

name: 3Gun Nation VR
summary: A VR shooting Game with different MAPS and Firearms. You will learn to aim and shoot firearms in both the Real and the VR world. It is all done in the comfort and safety of your home.

name: 3 Geeks
summary: A post-nuclear adventure in which you control three neurotic geeks who've escaped from a madhouse
